rules.natural: Provided that the research team conducts fieldwork in the national park, then the research team collects samples of mineral deposits.
Either the research team conducts fieldwork in the national park, or the research team secures a permit for the national park.

If a power outage occurs for the research team during the spring season, then, under the condition that the equipment (the spectrometer) fails for the research team, it is not the case that data becomes corrupted for the research team.
Whenever the software crashes for the research team, then, if the equipment (the spectrometer) fails for the research team, it follows that data does not become corrupted for the research team.
The research team publishes a paper, or a power outage occurs for the research team during the spring season, or the software crashes for the research team.
In the event that the research team receives peer rejection, then the research team does not publish a paper.
Either the research team receives peer rejection, or there is data inconsistency for the research team.
Given that there is data inconsistency for the research team, then the research team does not publish a paper.
Whenever the research team obtains funding from a project grant, then the research team analyzes samples of mineral deposits.
Provided that the research team uses a spectrometer as equipment, then data becomes corrupted for the research team.
Under the condition that the research team uses a spectrometer as equipment, the equipment (the spectrometer) fails for the research team.
The research team uses a spectrometer as equipment, or, if the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, then the research team obtains funding from a project grant.

Provided that it is not the case that if the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, then the research team obtains funding from a project grant, then the project is not suspended for the research team.

If it is not the case that, under the condition that it is not the case that if the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, then the research team obtains funding from a project grant, the project is suspended for the research team, then the fieldwork is extended for the research team.

facts.natural: The research team does not analyze samples of mineral deposits.
The fieldwork is not extended for the research team.

target.natural: The research team secures a permit for the national park.

(A1 → A2).natural: Provided that the research team conducts fieldwork in the national park, then the research team collects samples of mineral deposits.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the research team conducts fieldwork in the national park, or the research team secures a permit for the national park.

(A10 → (A9 → ¬A8)).natural: If a power outage occurs for the research team during the spring season, then, under the condition that the equipment (the spectrometer) fails for the research team, it is not the case that data becomes corrupted for the research team.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: A power outage happens for the research team during the spring season, or the software crashes for the research team.

(A11 → (A9 → ¬A8)).natural: Whenever the software crashes for the research team, then, if the equipment (the spectrometer) fails for the research team, it follows that data does not become corrupted for the research team.

(A12 ∨ (A10 ∨ A11)).natural: The research team publishes a paper, or a power outage occurs for the research team during the spring season, or the software crashes for the research team.

(A13 → ¬A12).natural: In the event that the research team receives peer rejection, then the research team does not publish a paper.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either the research team receives peer rejection, or there is data inconsistency for the research team.

(A14 → ¬A12).natural: Given that there is data inconsistency for the research team, then the research team does not publish a paper.

(A2 → A3).natural: If the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, then the research team analyzes samples of mineral deposits.

(A2 → A4).natural: Assuming the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, the research team obtains funding from a project grant.

(A4 → A3).natural: Whenever the research team obtains funding from a project grant, then the research team analyzes samples of mineral deposits.

(A7 → A8).natural: Provided that the research team uses a spectrometer as equipment, then data becomes corrupted for the research team.

(A7 → A9).natural: Under the condition that the research team uses a spectrometer as equipment, the equipment (the spectrometer) fails for the research team.

(A7 → ¬A8).natural: If the research team uses a spectrometer as equipment, then it is not the case that data becomes corrupted for the research team.

(A7 ∨ (A2 → A4)).natural: The research team uses a spectrometer as equipment, or, if the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, then the research team obtains funding from a project grant.

(A9 → ¬A8).natural: In the event that the equipment (the spectrometer) fails for the research team, then data does not become corrupted for the research team.

(¬(A2 → A4) → A5).natural: If it is not the case that whenever the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, the research team obtains funding from a project grant, then the project is suspended for the research team.

(¬(A2 → A4) → ¬A5).natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, then the research team obtains funding from a project grant, then the project is not suspended for the research team.

(¬(¬(A2 → A4) → A5) → A6).natural: If it is not the case that, under the condition that it is not the case that if the research team collects samples of mineral deposits, then the research team obtains funding from a project grant, the project is suspended for the research team, then the fieldwork is extended for the research team.

G.natural: The research team secures a permit for the national park.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the research team conducts fieldwork in the national park.

¬A12.natural: The research team does not publish a paper.

¬A2.natural: The research team does not collect samples of mineral deposits.

¬A3.natural: The research team does not analyze samples of mineral deposits.

¬A6.natural: The fieldwork is not extended for the research team.

¬A7.natural: The research team does not use a spectrometer as equipment.
